title: Discovery
description: Market research and opportunity validation

title: [strategizing-business] Create pricing and monetization strategy
description: Define pricing strategy, payment models, and revenue optimization tactics. Validate pricing through market research.

title: [architecting-systems] Design technical architecture and tech stack
description: Design system architecture, select appropriate tech stack, define API specifications, database schema, and infrastructure requirements. Prioritize speed to market and scalability.

title: [implementing-features] Setup project infrastructure and development environment
description: Initialize project repository, setup CI/CD pipeline, configure development environment, establish coding standards, and prepare infrastructure for MVP development.

title: [implementing-features] Build core MVP features
description: Implement the minimum viable product features as defined in the technical specification. Focus on core value proposition and user journey. Write clean, maintainable code following coding standards.

title: [implementing-features] Integrate payment and billing system
description: Integrate payment processing (Stripe/PayPal), implement subscription or one-time payment logic, add billing dashboard, and ensure secure handling of payment data.

title: [validating-work] Test MVP functionality and user flows
description: Comprehensive testing of MVP features, user flows, edge cases, and integration points. Create test suite, document bugs, verify all acceptance criteria are met.

title: [creating-content] Write high-converting landing page
description: Create compelling landing page copy with clear value proposition, benefits, social proof, and strong call-to-action. Optimize for conversions and SEO.

title: [creating-content] Create email marketing sequences
description: Design and write email sequences for onboarding, nurturing, and converting leads. Create welcome series, promotional emails, and engagement campaigns.

title: [implementing-features] Deploy to production
description: Deploy MVP to production environment, configure domain, setup SSL, ensure security best practices, and verify all systems are operational.

title: [validating-work] Analyze launch metrics and user behavior
description: Analyze key performance metrics, conversion rates, user behavior data, and identify areas for improvement. Create data-driven recommendations.

title: Strategy
description: Business model and technical architecture

title: [strategizing-business] Optimize conversion and growth strategy
description: Based on launch data, optimize conversion funnels, implement growth strategies, improve user acquisition, and refine business model for scalability.

title: [process-review] Implement Claude Code post-tool hooks for automation
description:
See .agent/reviews/review-2025-01-09.md for full details.

Primary action: Add post-tool hooks to .claude/settings.json for:
1. Auto-formatting (Prettier/Black/auto-detect after Edit/Write)
2. Dependency installation (npm/pnpm when package files change)
3. Beads database export (after bead operations)

This bead should be worked next as it improves the development process and should be implemented before the Build phase (business_3-3) begins.

title: [implementing-features] Implement workflow management UI and features
description: Build the workflow management interface including workflow builder, execution history, integration management, and template library. This completes the actual MVP implementation.

title: Discovery Epic
description: Market research and opportunity validation for Client Portal for Service Businesses

title: Strategy Epic
description: Business model and technical architecture for Client Portal

title: Build Epic
description: MVP implementation of Client Portal

title: Launch Epic
description: Go-to-market execution for Client Portal

title: [discovering-opportunities] Research agency client communication pain points
description: Interview 20 agency owners/consultants to validate pain points around client file sharing, revision management, and communication chaos

title: [discovering-opportunities] Analyze existing client portal solutions
description: Competitive analysis of ShareFile, Dropbox Paper, Google Drive, agency project management tools to identify gaps and opportunities

title: [discovering-opportunities] Validate demand with landing page test
description: Create simple landing page describing the client portal concept, drive traffic to measure interest and collect waitlist signups

title: Build
description: MVP implementation

title: [strategizing-business] Define business model and pricing
description: Create detailed business model canvas, define pricing tiers (//), calculate unit economics, and map revenue projections to k/mo goal

title: [architecting-systems] Design technical architecture
description: Design system architecture: Next.js + PostgreSQL + S3, define data models (clients, projects, files, messages), plan authentication, and infrastructure setup

title: [strategizing-business] Create customer avatar and messaging
description: Define ideal customer profile (agency size, type, tech stack), craft positioning and messaging, identify marketing channels

title: [implementing-features] Setup project infrastructure
description: Initialize Next.js project, setup PostgreSQL database, configure authentication (NextAuth), setup S3 bucket for file storage, establish CI/CD

title: [implementing-features] Build core portal features
description: Implement client dashboard, file upload/download, project organization, message threads, milestone tracking, and branded portal customization

title: [implementing-features] Implement notification system
description: Build email notifications for new messages, file uploads, milestone updates, and weekly activity summaries using SendGrid or Resend

title: [validating-work] Test MVP with beta users
description: Onboard 5 beta agencies, test all user flows, collect feedback, identify critical bugs, validate usability

title: [creating-content] Write landing page copy
description: Write compelling landing page copy: headline, value proposition, benefits, feature list, social proof, CTAs for waitlist signup

title: [creating-content] Create email outreach sequences
description: Write cold email sequences for agency outreach, create onboarding email flow for new signups, write nurture sequence for leads

title: [implementing-features] Deploy to production
description: Deploy application to Vercel, configure custom domain, setup monitoring, prepare production environment for public launch

title: Launch
description: Go-to-market execution

title: Add git remote and backup 33 commits
Commit uncommitted changes (bead state, research docs)
Scale
description: Optimization and growth

title: [discovering-opportunities] Research market trends and identify profitable business opportunities
description: Research current market trends, identify high-potential business opportunities, and document findings. Focus on opportunities that can be validated quickly with low upfront investment.

title: [discovering-opportunities] Analyze competition and market gaps
description: Analyze competitive landscape for identified opportunities, identify market gaps and underserved segments, and document competitive advantages we can leverage.

title: [discovering-opportunities] Validate demand through customer research
description: Conduct customer interviews, surveys, or landing page tests to validate actual demand for the chosen opportunity. Document validation results and pivot if needed.

title: [strategizing-business] Define business model and revenue streams
description: Create detailed business model canvas, define revenue streams, cost structure, and unit economics. Ensure path to profitability is clear.
